embeds.title: Rule 2
embeds.description: Don't be racist/sexist/homophobic or anything else around that

embeds.title: Rule 5
embeds.description: No griefing, stealing, or doing anything on anybody elses property without their permission.

embeds.title: Rule 6
embeds.description: No NSFW images unless in the proper channels

embeds.title: Additional Info
embeds.description: We have event staff roles (People who help certain aspects of Cipollaworld, such as the MC server or game nights) that only Cipolla Frequente can apply for

embeds.title: Additional Info
embeds.description: Suggest any additions/changes you want made to the server in #suggestions

embeds.title: Punishments
embeds.description: 3 warnings: Kick -> 2 more warnings: Ban -> (After appeal passed by #suggestions ) -> 3 more warnings: Permaban

embeds.title: Cipolla Frequente
embeds.description: Must be in VC for at least 30 min a week & Must send at least 1 message a day (10 messages a week) to earn Cipolla Frequente. Also, when you leave twice, you lose it for a week
